summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing an easement agreement with Larry Worley Associates, LLC; providing for the relocation of easement and release of easement, for access purposes across the City of Seattle's Tolt Pipeline right of way, in the Northeast quarter of Section 27 and the North half of Section 26, Township 26 North, Range 7 East, W.M., in King County, Washington; and accepting the release of a certain easement, and the release of certain condemnation reservation rights as stated in Stipulation "A" of King County Superior Court Cause 514489, in consideration therefor.
